channel.title: Wanted: Games that make you laugh
channel.description: I'm in need of some game recommendations. I played a ton of heavier games lately, and while I really enjoy them I feel in need of some lighter, funny or even silly games. Games that I put in this category and which I like a lot are: Game of Love (Bachelorette hack of Final Girl) [Behind the Magic](https://randylubin.itch.io/behind-the-magic) I played both of them quite often and was wondering what other games are out there that will make your belly hurt from laughter :smiley:

item.description:
@Marcio_Moreira wrote:

I second the Grant Howitt rec! Sometimes I just pair a premisse of one of his games with the Tearable RPG and it’s a blast.
More recently I loved playing Shitty Adventurers and Vampire Block Party, a one page game based on What we do in the shadows.

item.dc:creator: @CrudelyDrawnSwords
item.description:
@CrudelyDrawnSwords wrote:

A lot of the Grant Howitt one-page games start from a funny premise, carry it through some simple and funny mechanics and result in a good time. I guess most people know Honey Heist pretty well, but Nice Marines, Crash Pandas and Jason Statham’s Big Vacation are other good starting points.
